archimate:Capability.name: Customer Management
archimate:Capability.documentation:
The ability to develop and manage relationships with our internal customers, where a customer is defined as a role that consumes an architecture output (or collaborates with the architecture practice) as part of an activity to implement change. This includes a range of roles within the enterprise such as developers, team leads, agile coaches, business analysts and so on.
Outcomes:
Strong, open relationships with customers based on trust and understanding Clear understanding of responsibilities
